00025 #include <robot/control/ikor/LeastNorm>
00026 
00027 #include <base/SVD>
00028 
00029 using robot::control::ikor::LeastNorm;
00030 
00031 using base::SVD;
00032 
00033 
00034 base::Matrix LeastNorm::solve(const Matrix& A, const Vector& b)
00035 {
00036   // Use Single-Value-Decomposition (SVD)
00037   SVD svd(A);
00038   Vector g = svd.inv()*b; // A^-1.b
00039 
00040   Matrix G(1,b.size()); // a single row (one least-square solution)
00041   for(Int c=0; c<b.size(); c++) G(0,c) = b[c];
00042 
00043   return G;
00044 }
